pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Weather Data from the Environment and Climate Change Canada Website // Provides means for downloading historical weather data from the Environment and Climate Change Canada website (http://climate.weather.gc.ca/historical_data/search_hi storic_data_e.html). Data can be downloaded from multiple stations and over large date ranges and automatically processed into a single dataset. Tools are also provided to identify stations either by name or proximity to a location.
